Package com.bfo.zeroconf

Class Service.Builder

java.lang.Object
com.bfo.zeroconf.Service.Builder
Enclosing class:
Service
public static class Service.Builder extends Object
A Builder class to create a new Service for announcement

    • setName

      public Service.Builder setName(String name)
      (Required) Set the instance name
      Parameters:
      name - the name
      Returns:
      this

    • setHost

      public Service.Builder setHost(String host)
      Set the fully qualifier host name - it should contain a domain. If not set, will be generated from Zeroconf.getLocalHostName() and the domain, from setDomain(java.lang.String) or Zeroconf.getDomain()
      Parameters:
      host - the host.
      Returns:
      this

    • setType

      public Service.Builder setType(String type)
      (Required) Set the service type - a combination of the service name and protocol, eg "_http._tcp" Both name and protocol must begin with an underscore and be separated by a single dot.
      Parameters:
      type - the type
      Returns:
      this

    • setDomain

      public Service.Builder setDomain(String domain)
      Set the domain, eg ".local". If not set this defaults to Zeroconf.getDomain()
      Parameters:
      domain - the domain
      Returns:
      this

    • setFQDN

      public Service.Builder setFQDN(String fqdn)
      Set the fully-qualified domain name of this service, eg "My Service._http._tcp.local". Can be called as an alternative to calling setName(java.lang.String), setType(java.lang.String) and setDomain(java.lang.String)
      Parameters:
      fqdn - the fully-qualified domain name
      Returns:
      this

    • setPort

      public Service.Builder setPort(int port)
      (Required) Set the port to announce.
      Parameters:
      port - the port, between 0 and 65535. A value of zero means no port.
      Returns:
      this

    • put

      public Service.Builder put(String key, String value)
      Add a text value to the Service
      Parameters:
      key - the text key
      value - the text value. If this is null, the key will be added without any "="
      Returns:
      this

    • putAll

      public Service.Builder putAll(Map<String,String> map)
      Add text values from the supplied Map to the Service
      Parameters:
      map - the map
      Returns:
      this

    • addAddress

      public Service.Builder addAddress(InetAddress address)
      Add an internet address to the Service. If not specified, the addresses from Zeroconf.getLocalAddresses() will be used
      Parameters:
      address - the address
      Returns:
      this

    • build

      public Service build(Zeroconf zeroconf)
      Build a new Service which can be announced with Service.announce()
      Parameters:
      zeroconf - the Zeroconf instance to bind this Service to
      Returns:
      the new Service
